Management of cookiesIf you want to stop your browser from accepting cookies, you can configure your browser’s cookie settings. In addition, you can disable non-essential cookies by withdrawing your consent at any time. Please check your web browser for more information on how to delete or disable cookies. If you choose to disable cookies, certain functionalities may not be available and your user experience may be deteriorated.      Embedded content from third party websitesDirac’s website may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.) from third party websites. Embedded content behaves in the same way as if the visitor had visited the relevant third party website. These third party websites may collect personal data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party content, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content.  Types of cookiesDirac uses the following types of cookies. Necessary cookies. Necessary cookies are essential in order for our website to function and cannot be switched off. Functional cookies. Functional cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. Functional cookies are used only if you have provided your consent to the use of such cookies. Statistical cookies (performance      cookies). Statistical cookies help us understand how visitors interact      with our website, measure the performance of our website and identify any      need for improvement. Statistical cookies are used only if you have      provided your consent to the use of such cookies.  Marketing cookies. Marketing cookies are used to deliver content that fits your interests on our site and to present you with relevant content on third-party sites.                     About Dirac
Dirac is all about giving you the best sound possible. Our digital audio solutions create an expanded and natural soundscape that envelops you. Dirac is trusted worldwide by top brands, consumers, professional studios, and audiophiles alike to deliver a superior audio experience. A transparent, optimized, immersive sound, regardless of content, device, or space.
We’re Dirac. The future of sound.
